name: cunitest
description: End to end testing using cucumber and nighthawk

scripts.test: mkdirp tests/report && cucumber-js --require-module @babel/register --require cucumber.conf.js --require tests/steps --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:tests/report/cucumber_report.json tests/features
scripts.debug: cross-env DEBUG=nightwatch-api NIGHTWATCH_ENV=chrome NIGHTWATCH_VERBOSE=true node --inspect ./node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js --require-module @babel/register --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty

author: Torsten Dreyer <torsten@t3r.de>
